text:
Mineral Resources Development (Fossil Site) Order 2007

I make the following order under section 163(1) of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

4 April 2007

P. A. LENNON

Minister for Economic Development and Resources

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Mineral Resources Development (Fossil Site) Order 2007 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Fossil site
    The area specified in Schedule 1 to this order is declared to be a fossil site.

SCHEDULE 1 - Fossil Site

All that area of land comprising about 67 hectares in the vicinity of Lune River shown hatched and bounded by a heavy black line on Plan 7568 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Schedule 2 to this order.

SCHEDULE 2 - Plan

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 2 May 2007

This order is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
